# Loading packages

```{r}

library("tidyverse")

source(file = "R/99_proj_func.R")
```

# Loading data files

```{r}

data_clean <- read_csv(file = "data/data_clean.csv")
```

# CD4 vs CD8

```{r}

CD4_vs_CD8_aug <- data_clean |>
  filter(lineage %in% c("CD4 T cells", "CD8 T cells"),
         cell_type != "CD4ISP",
         cell_type != "TCD8RAdim",
         hierarchy_level == 4)
  
  

```
